alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:12PM EDT until June 12 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 512 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Leesburg to 7 miles southeast of Cuthbert, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Albany, Shellman, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Sasser, Bronwood, Stocks, Radium Springs, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, Carnegie, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Palmyra, Clarks Mill and Red Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Worth
